author: Author

commands.name: avatar
commands.description: Sends the avatar of a user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose avatar you want to be sent.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to display info of.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to display info of.

commands.name: emoji
commands.description: Sends the emoji as an image.

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji you want to convert to an image.

commands.name: love
commands.description: Checks the compatibility level between two users.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to boop.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to hug.

commands.name: clop
commands.description: Sends a clop image from Manebooru.

commands.name: mlp
commands.description: Download episodes of MLP via torrent!

avatar: Sends the mentioned user's profile picture. You can also use the user's ID.
userinfo: Shows info about the user. You can mention them or use their ID.
roleinfo: Shows info about the role. You can type the name of the role to search for it.
emoji: Sends the emoji as an image.
love: Checks the compatibility level between two users.
booru: Sends a safe image from Manebooru. You can type search tags.
Sends a clop image from Manebooru. You can type search tags. Can only be used in NSFW channels.
mlp: Download episodes of MLP via torrent!

admin: Sets the prefix of the bot commands in this server.
Sets the language of the bot in this server.
Sets the default hex color for embeds.
When turned off, every NSFW command will be disabled and hidden in the help menu.
Blocks a word in the server.
Unblocks a word in the server.
Blocks a phrase in the server.
Unlocks a phrase in the server.
Shows the list of blocked words and phrases.
Bulk deletes messages. Messages older than two weeks can not be deleted.
Creates a role menu. Every argument is a role ID.
Shows a preview of the welcome card for the memtioned user.

wrong_channel: The command you sent cannot be used in that channel.
message_deleted_dm: Your message was removed due to containing something not allowed in the server. Please, be careful with what you say.
you_must_send_an_emoji: You need to send an emoji.
self_love: I know self love is important, but don't be a narcissist.
lovemeter_messages: Very unlikely but there may be something.
There could be something, but I do not want to give illusions.
Very likely to be something. You can try.
Quite compatible. Could be a cute couple.
These two are making out for sure.
They are meant to be together forever.
nsfw_only: This command can only be used in NSFW channels.
how_to_delete: Hit ❌ if this image is inappropriate.
name: Name
boost_title: Thank you for boosting the server!
bulk_delete_two_weeks: Messages older than 2 weeks can not be removed.
bulk_delete_missing_permissions: I do not have permission to delete messages in this channel.
bulk_delete_max_100: You can only remove less than 100 messages at once.
no_images_found: Couldn't find any images matching that query.
the_current_prefix_for_this_server_is: The current prefix for this server is
please_specify_one_or_more_channels: Please, specify one or more channels.
select_the_roles_that_you_want: Select the roles that you want
you_can_only_add_up_to_25_roles_to_the_m: You can only add up to 25 roles to the menu.
manage_roles_permission_required: Chrysalis needs the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission to use this command.
chrysalis_role_too_low: Chrysalis' role is lower than the role you're requesting. Please, ask an admin to fix it.
invalid_channel: At least one of the channels you typed is invalid.
filter_not_found: Filter not found. Please, make sure that the filter is public.
help_time_out: Time to move between pages is over.
torrent_footer: The episodes are downloaded as torrents. Chrysalis recommends downloading them using qBitTorrent, due to it not containing ads. Links are provided by yayponies.no /)
error_fetching_episodes: There was an error fetching the episodes. Please, try again later.
goodbye_user: Goodbye, **{user}**. Hope we can see you again soon.
attach_files_permission_missing: Chrysalis doesn't have permission to send images to this channel.
